sr.id, sr.title, sr.name, sr.level, sr.description, sr.create_by AS createBy, sr.update_by AS updateBy, sr.create_time AS createTime, sr.update_time AS updateTime

mapper.select: SELECT FROM sys_user su WHERE su.username = #{username}
